page.title: 13CHURCHES
page.content: {KENMUIR PARISH CHURCH AND CARMYLE {PARISH CHURCH}belong to the Church of Scotland.Rev.James Davies is minister of both . He sees the church as a mission centre where people have a sense of community and enjoy life to the full.Kenmuir was founded in 1883 and has 320 members. Carmyle was founded in 1906 and has 340 members.Both churches have youth and adult organisations . {Greyfriars Monastery}houses a Roman Catholic Group called "The Divine Word Missionaries." They recruit,train and support the mission field abroad. { {St Joachim's }is a Roman Catholic Church in Carmyle.Father William Murphy aims for a sense of community with people living in love of God and love of neighbour as oneself.It has 1400 baptised Roman Catholics and many vibrant organisations.
